name: Denny Micro Cottage Pie 180G
description: Minced beef and chopped onion in a rich gravy, topped with mashed potato.
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Number_Of_Uses>1 This pack contains 1 serving</Number_Of_Uses><Cooking_Guidelines>Cooking Instructions (General): For best results cook in your oven. All appliances vary, these are guidelines only. Ensure the product is piping hot throughout prior to serving. Do not reheat.Oven cook (From Chilled): Pre-heat your oven to 190°C/375°F/Gas Mark 5. Remove the outer packaging and cut off the film lid with a knife or scissors. Place on a baking tray in the centre of the oven for approximately 20 minutes. If using a fan assisted oven reduce the time and temperature in accordance with the manufacturer's guidelines.Microwave (From Chilled): Remove the outer packaging and pierce the film lid several times. Cook on full power (800W) for 3 minutes, then leave to stand for 1 minute. Cut off the film lid with a knife or scissors, then serve.</Cooking_Guidelines></Cooking_Instructions>
ingredients: Cooked Mashed Potato (45%) (Potato (contains Sulphites), Rehydrated Potato Flake, Butter (Milk), Milk, Salt, White Pepper)
Beef Stock (Beef Extract, Salt, Flavouring, Molasses, Tomato Paste, Dried Onion, Cornflour, Concentrated Lemon Juice, Dried Carob, Black Pepper)
PromotionDescription: Save £2.15 on any Tasty Foods chilled chicken or steak pie 800g
